idea-plugin.name: Flutter App Template Generator
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin help to generate Flutter project template with your model entities.
  • Using Redux to manage state and update UI
  • json to dart entities class, support int, bool, String, double, Datetime
  • generate restful api base on your json entities
  • generate database module
  • generate basic page with BottomNavigatorBar, Draw, AppBar TopTabBar, ListView(bind model entry from restful api or Database
  • generate CustomScrollView page with FixedExtentLit, Grid, BoxAdapter
